shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery Policy
shipping.introduction: At ShopName, we strive to provide fast, reliable shipping services to all our customers. This policy outlines our shipping methods, delivery times, and other important information regarding the delivery of your orders.

methods.title: Shipping Methods
methods.description: We offer several shipping methods to meet your needs and budget. Choose the option that works best for you during checkout:

overnight.name: Overnight Shipping
overnight.description: Next business day delivery (order must be placed before 2 PM)

costs.title: Shipping Costs
costs.description: Shipping costs are calculated based on the weight of your order, the shipping method selected, and your delivery location. The exact shipping cost will be displayed during checkout before you complete your purchase.
costs.freeShipping: Orders over $50 qualify for free standard shipping within the continental United States.

processing.title: Order Processing Time
processing.description: All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed on the next business day.
processing.point1: Orders placed before 12 PM EST on business days are typically processed the same day.
processing.point2: During peak seasons (holidays, special promotions), processing may take up to 3 business days.
processing.point3: You will receive a shipping confirmation email with tracking information once your order has been shipped.

tracking.title: Tracking Your Order
tracking.description: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this tracking number to monitor the status of your delivery.
tracking.additional: You can also track your order by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

international.title: International Shipping
international.description: We currently ship to select international destinations. International orders may take 7-21 business days to arrive, depending on the destination country and customs processing.
international.duties: International orders may be subject to import duties, taxes, and customs fees, which are the responsibility of the recipient. These charges are not included in the purchase price or shipping cost.

issues.title: Delivery Issues
issues.description: If you experience any issues with your delivery, please contact our customer service team within 48 hours of the expected delivery date.
issues.contact: For packages showing as delivered but not received, please check with neighbors, building management, or your local post office before contacting us.

changes.title: Changes to Shipping Address
changes.description: If you need to change your shipping address after placing an order, please contact us immediately. We cannot guarantee that we will be able to change the shipping address once an order has been processed.

shipping.questions: If you have any questions about our shipping policy, please don't hesitate to contact us.

policy.title: Return Policy
policy.description: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not entirely happy with your order, we're here to help you return or exchange it.

eligibility.title: Return Eligibility
eligibility.description1: You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We also accept returns of used items within 14 days if the item is defective or damaged upon receipt.
eligibility.description2: To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging.
eligibility.new_items: New, unopened items: 30 days from delivery date
eligibility.defective_items: Defective or damaged items: 14 days from delivery date

nonReturnable.title: Non-Returnable Items
nonReturnable.description: The following items cannot be returned:
nonReturnable.item3: Personal care items (for health and hygiene reasons)

process.title: Return Process
process.description: To initiate a return, please follow these steps:
process.step1: Contact our customer service team to obtain a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number
process.step2: Package the item securely with all the original packaging and include your RMA number
process.step3: Ship the item to the address provided by our customer service team

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Once we receive and inspect your return, we will notify you of the status of your refund. If approved, your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment.
refunds.timeline: Refunds typically take 5-10 business days to appear on your statement, depending on your payment method and financial institution.

late.title: Late or Missing Refunds
late.description: If you haven't received a refund after 10 business days, please check your bank account again. Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted. If you've done all of this and you still have not received your refund, please contact our customer service team.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.description: If you need to exchange an item for the same product, send us an email and ship your item to the return address provided. If you're exchanging for a different product, please return the original item for a refund and place a new order.

shipping.title: Return Shipping Costs
shipping.description: You will be responsible for paying the shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable.
shipping.note: If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

questions.title: Questions About Returns?
questions.description: If you have any questions about our return policy, please don't hesitate to contact us.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you visit our website or make a purchase from us. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information.

section1.title: Personal Information We Collect
section1.content: When you visit the Site, we collect certain information about your device, your interaction with the Site, and information necessary to process your purchases.

personal_data.title: Types of Personal Information
personal_data.description: We may collect the following types of personal information:
personal_data.name: Name

section2.title: How We Use Your Personal Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our Services, to process your purchases, to communicate with you, and to detect, prevent, or address fraud.

purposes.title: We use your information for the following purposes:
purposes.process_orders: To process and fulfill your orders, including shipping and payment processing
purposes.improve_service: To improve and personalize your experience on our website
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about your orders, account, and promotional offers
purposes.security: To protect our website and customers from fraud and unauthorized access

section3.title: Sharing Your Personal Information
section3.content: We share your Personal Information with service providers to help us provide our services and fulfill our contracts with you.

third_parties.title: Third Parties We Share Information With
third_parties.service_description: We share information with service providers who process data on our behalf, such as payment processors, shipping companies, and marketing services.
third_parties.partners_description: We may share information with business partners to offer you certain products, services, or promotions.
third_parties.legal_description: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

section4.title: Your Rights
section4.content: You have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us.

rights.access_description: You can request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
rights.rectification_description: You can request that we correct any inaccurate or incomplete information.
rights.erasure_description: You can request that we delete your personal information in certain circumstances.
rights.restriction_description: You can request that we restrict the processing of your personal information.

section5.title: Data Retention
section5.content: When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Order Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.

section6.title: Cookies
section6.content: We use cookies to maintain session information and to enhance your browsing experience on our website.
section6.cookie_policy: For more detailed information about the cookies we use, please see our Cookie Policy.

section7.title: Changes
section7.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us.
